sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you see an <radical>animal</radical> among the <radical>flowers</radical> in a <radical>rice paddy</radical>, chances are it’s a <kanji>cat</kanji>. Cats love rice paddy flowers, almost as much as they love catnip.
meaningInfo: Picture this cat meowing and purring as it rubs up against all the flowers in the rice paddy field. Aww, it’s so cute!
readingMnemonic: Wait a minute… This <kanji>cat</kanji> is pretty odd looking. You take a closer look, seeing it is missing its <reading>neck</reading> (<ja>ねこ</ja>). You go to pet it, but it's super sensitive about that area of its head, which is basically a face connected to a body...
readingInfo: Try not to imagine this too hard. It is disturbing.
